Html:
Hi,

I wanted to play with the source and tried building with the newest version of QuickGraph, but it can't find ShortestDistanceRelaxer.Instance. (How) can I fix this?

Jasper

I was trying to rebuild in .NET v4.0 and getting the same error. Are there any updated or has anyone figured a way around this?

Thanks.

I hope it's not too late, but i was challenging the same problem. Just use
DistanceRelaxers.ShortestDistance
from namespace QuickGraph.Algorithms instead of
ShortestDistanceRelaxer.Instance
from QuickGraph.Algorithms.ShortestPath. The DistanceRelaxers.ShortestDistance is an instance itself.
